alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Charles Mix; Douglas; Hutchinson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 1:21PM MST until January 16 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, with wind gusting as high as 40 mph, patchy blowing snow is leading to scattered visibility drops below one half mile. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Charles Mix, Douglas, Hutchinson and Bon Homme Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bon Homme; Charles Mix; Douglas; Hutchinson
